content: Aloha, My name is Mr. Sifuentes. I am the Assistant District Manager for the Kapolei Hawaii SSA office. I do all the hiring and what I need are resumes from veterans. If you are interested in working for the federal government, send your resume to: or email your resume to: Our office are located on Oahu (Honolulu and Kapolei), Maui, Hilo/Big Island, Kaui, Saipan, Guam and American Samoa. CONTACT MEMBER THRU HIS PROFILE This message has been edited. Last edited by: <NEMESIS1960>, Tue 17 March 2009 02:09 PM
